mapper.select: select a.fbno, a.fbtitle, a.fbthumnail, a.fbcontents1, a.fbcontents2, a.fbimg1, a.fbimg2, a.fbimg3, a.fbimg4, a.fbimg5, a.fbaddr1, a.fbaddr2, a.fbupdatedate, b.lno from foodboard as a, localkr as b where a.lno = b.lno and fbno > 0 order by lno asc limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.number}

select a.fbno, a.fbtitle, a.fbthumnail, a.fbcontents1, a.fbcontents2, a.fbimg1, a.fbimg2, a.fbimg3, a.fbimg4, a.fbimg5, a.fbaddr1, a.fbaddr2, a.fbupdatedate, b.lno from foodboard as a, localkr as b where a.lno = b.lno and fbno = #{fbno}
